tool_description: Organizes multiple scripture passages around common themes, topics, or theological concepts for systematic study.

theme.description: Central theme or topic to organize passages around

passages.description: Array of scripture references to organize

grouping_method.description: Method for grouping: chronological, topical, progressive, or comparative

include_subthemes.description: Identify and group by subthemes within the main theme

add_bridging_passages.description: Add related passages that bridge between groups

error_messages: Empty theme: Provide a specific theme or topic for organizing passages.
Insufficient passages: Provide at least 3 passages for meaningful grouping.
Too many passages: Maximum 100 passages allowed for grouping.
Invalid grouping method: Use one of [chronological, topical, progressive, comparative].
Invalid passages: One or more scripture references are not in valid format.
usage: Provide a theme and array of scripture references. Optionally specify grouping method and enable subthemes or bridging passages. Returns organized passage groups with explanations.

groups.description: Names of identified groups or subthemes

grouped_passages.description: Passages organized by groups (array of string arrays)

group_descriptions.description: Explanation of each group's focus within the theme

bridging_passages.description: Additional passages that connect themes if requested

study_sequence.description: Recommended order for studying the groups
